英文公告.機關地址: 80203 5F., No.2, Sihwei 3rd Rd., Public Work Bureau, Kaohsiung City 802, Taiwan
英文公告.標案名稱: Design and Construction Supervision Services for Coastal Conservation and Landscape Improvement in Cieding District of Kaohsiung City
英文公告.廠商地址: 3F., No.137, Dadun 17th St., Nantun Dist., Taichung City 408, Taiwan (R.O.C.)
英文公告.附加說明: 1. The project area is located to the west of Provincial Highway No.17, starting from estuary of Er-ren Creek in the north to Signda Fishing Port in the south (facing the sea, the highway not included.) The total length is about 5.8km. 2. The major project content is design, construction supervision, other related works for the 5.8km coastal area mentioned above, and proposal of improvement strategies for the environment and landscapes as needed. In addition to redevelopment of the existing facilities, the consideration to overall coastal area, related environment & landscapes, and pedestrian & bike routes are required.3. This project will be divided into phases. The construction area and content of every phase should be decided according to Party A’s directions.

決標資料.履約執行機關: 機關代碼：3.97.25機關名稱：高雄市政府水利局
